metadata.description: Body rules divided into 3 expert groups for parallel detection

expert_1_formatting.name: Formatting Specialist
expert_1_formatting.description: Expert in dates, abbreviations, and number notation

expert_2_quotation_naming.name: Quotation & Naming Specialist
expert_2_quotation_naming.description: Expert in quotation marks, title capitalization, and Korean-specific notation

expert_3_grammar.name: Grammar Specialist
expert_3_grammar.description: Expert in verb agreement, word choice, and general grammar rules

notes: Expert 1 focuses on formatting rules that require pattern matching (dates, numbers, abbreviations)
Expert 2 handles quotation marks (A15/A16/A19 confusion zone) and Korean-specific rules
Expert 3 handles diverse grammar rules including verb agreement and word choice
Each expert receives the full body text and only checks their assigned rules
Results are merged before correction stage
